CreateProgramState.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ump.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: CreateProgramState
<公共请求参数>

{
	"GroupCode": "group_code",
	"MallId": 1,
	"ProgramStateItems": [{
		"ServerIp": "192.168.1.1",
		"ProgramName": "ops_server",
		"OnlineCount": 1,
		"OfflineCount": 1,
		"State": 1
	}]
}
